stanza.line: If my dear love were but the child of (a)state(/a)
It might for Fortune's bastard be (b)unfathered(/b)
As subject to time's love or to time's (a)hate(/a)
Weeds among weeds or flowers with flowers (b)gathered(/b)
No it was builded far from (c)accident(/c)
It suffers not in smiling pomp nor (d)falls(/d)
Whereto th' inviting time our fashion (d)calls(/d)
Which works on leases of short-numbered (f)hours(/f)
That it nor grows with heat nor drowns with (f)showers(/f)
To this I witness call the fools of (g)time(/g)
Which die for goodness who have lived for (g)crime(/g)
